original_title: PayMedia wins Gold for digital onboarding, ID verification and eKYC solution
original_body_lines: PayMedia, a leading provider of digital identity verification solutions won the prestigious Gold Award for its eKYC solution at the National Best Quality Software Awards (NBQSA) 2023. The ceremony, held on October 25, 2023, with the participating of Ranil Wickramasinghe, the President of Sri Lanka, at the Monarch Imperial, was a celebration of excellence, innovation, and dedication to quality in the technology industry. As businesses across various sectors are moving towards paperless transactions and online services, the need for secure and efficient customer identity verification has never been more critical. PayMedia’s eKYC solution provides a comprehensive and user-friendly platform for businesses to verify customer identities swiftly and securely.
PayMedia’s CEO, Kanishka Weeramunda said his main focus was to expansion of eKYC, which would not only enhance security and fraud prevention but also reduce paperwork and administrative burdens.
